From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::DrillBit::

He saw what was happaning. He opened the chamber and held her body.
"NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!1"
The sound of his scream could be heard 1/2 a mile away.
He held her close. He began to cry.
"I... I... I love you!"
Hundreds of thoughts ran through his head. They would never be married.
They would never settle down back on Cybertron, and have a family. He
thought of who to call. He opened his link.
"S.. St.. Star Scream! Wherever you are get back to base NOW!!!"
He began rocking bace and forward, holding her. He would have revenge!
